=======
History
=======

0.0.1 (2020-06-21)
------------------

* First release.


0.0.2 (2020-06-22)
------------------

* Modified call to Medusa Protocol package.
* Added support of tests for TCP Server

0.0.3 (2020-06-23)
------------------

* Added UDP Server.
* Added Client for TCP Server call
* Added Client for UDP Server call
* Added Tests for TCP and UDP Server
